sm_assginment module¶

class sm_assginment.Normal¶

Bases: smach.state.State

Class for the NORMAL state

Robot walks randomly for a random amount of times. If “play” command is received, goes to PLAY state. If no command is received, goes to sleep.

normal_counter: int pub: publisher (geometry_msgs.Point) to /move_coords sub_command: subscriber (std_msgs.String) to /command sub_flag: subscriber (std_msgs.Bool) to /arrived

execute(userdata)¶
class sm_assginment.Play¶

Bases: smach.state.State

Class for the PLAY state

Robot plays for a random amount of times. Each time goes towards the man and waits for a gesture, then goes towards the indicated coords and repeats. When it finishes playing goes to NORMAL state.

man_x: (int) Man x coordinate (0-1000) man_y: (int) Man y coordinate (0-1000) play_times: (int) Amount of times to play (1-5)

play_counter: int pub_command: publisher (std_msgs.String) to /gesture_request pub_coords: publisher (geometry_msgs.Point) to /move_coords sub_flag: subscriber (std_msgs.Bool) to /arrived

execute(userdata)¶
class sm_assginment.Sleep¶

Bases: smach.state.State

Class for the SLEEP state

The robot goes to the sleep coordinate, stays there for a while, then wakes up and goes to NORMAL state

sleep_x: (int) Sleep x coordinate (0-1000) sleep_y: (int) Sleep y coordinate (0-1000) time_sleep: (int) Sleeping time (1-10)

pub: publisher (geometry_msgs.Point) to /move_coords sub_flag: subscriber (std_msgs.Bool) to /arrived

execute(userdata)¶
sm_assginment.cb_command(data)¶
sm_assginment.cb_flag(data)¶
sm_assginment.main()¶

State machine initialization

Creates the state machine, add states and link their outputs.
